text: Jyare tame stri'one talaka apo ane teni'o potano samayagalo puro karavani najika hoya to have teni'one sari rite svikari lo athava to bhala'i sathe chuti kari do ane teni'one takalipha pahoncadavana hetuthi atyacara karava mate na roki rakho, je vyakti avum kare tene potana jiva para atyacara karyo, tame allahana adesane thaththa-masakari na banavo ane allahana upakara je tamara para che tene yada karo ane je kami kitaba ane hikamata avatarita kari che jenathi tamane sikhamana api rahyo che tene pana (yada karo). Ane allaha ta'alathi darata raho ane jani lo ke allaha ta'ala dareka vastuni khabara rakhe che
